thread.title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion

title: High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion
text:
High praise and deep concern after Southwest jet explosion 2:35am IST - 01:52 
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion is hailed as hero, investigators Wednesday focused on what caused the engine to explode mid-air and airlines around the world rushed to inspect the safety of their fleets.   
As the Southwest pilot in Tuesday's deadly jet explosion is hailed as hero, investigators Wednesday focused on what caused the engine to explode mid-air and airlines around the world rushed to inspect the safety of their fleets.  //reut.rs/2JUt0p4
